synopsis.text: Now here is the spirit of camaraderie and the thrill of competition more alive than in the world of high school rhythmic gymnastics. For Shoutarou Futaba, his fascination with the sport began during the final summer of his middle school years. Upon enrolling in Soshukan Private High School, also known as Ao High, he eagerly joins the boys' gymnastics club, where he encounters a diverse group of seniors and the talented gymnast, Ryouya Misato. As Shoutarou and his teammates navigate the trials and tribulations of their youth, they find solace and strength in their shared passion for gymnastics. Together, they strive to overcome obstacles and reach new heights, aiming to leave their mark in the world of competitive gymnastics. This captivating drama explores the dedication, resilience, and unwavering determination of these young athletes as they chase their dreams and forge unbreakable bonds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
